Title: A Way Out

Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: As revelations abound, Juliana is forced to make the hardest decision of her life. Wegener returns to Germany to carry out his mission. Smith risks becoming the prey as he goes hunting with...
